argument.description: Optional. The number of digits to round the fractional seconds to.

description: The PostgreSQL localtime function returns the current time.
sample:
postgres=# SELECT localtime;
      time
-----------------
 20:18:08.586881
(1 row)

postgres=# SELECT localtime(1);
    time
------------
 20:18:08.6
(1 row)

postgres=# SELECT localtime(2);
    time
-------------
 20:18:08.59
(1 row)

postgres=# SELECT localtime(3);
     time
--------------
 20:18:08.587
(1 row)
